description: An epub extension reader implementing the epubjs library. Customizable theme and fonts. And an integration of an MP3 player
title: EPUB Reader
stack: React.js, Context API, epub.js, Sass, TailwindCSS

description: Aesthetic pomodoro timer website. It implements customizing the background images and font styles
title: Pomodoro Master

description: Music player that accepts different kinds of file extension such as Mp3 and MAV.
title: Linger

description: Movie application that displays the list of movies coming from an API called The Movie Database. It includes a search option alongside of a filtering on movie name and genres
title: CineVista
